extendedInfo.description: My Beach HD is an Editor's Choice on Google Play!Now with custom signs, custom airplane banners, automatic time of day based on location, Sunset, Dawn, Morning, Evening, Night time, fireworks, and more!From the creators of your favorite live wallpapers, spend a relaxing summer day at your own private beach - everytime you use your device.Relax in the shade while waves froth at the shore of your very own stretch of secluded beach. Clouds float past a quaint lighthouse in the distance, and a boat gently rocks in the shallows. An airplane with your message drifts through the idylic scene.Choose the sign message on the beach, or hide the sign altogether - it's all up to you! Watch closely, and you may even see a shark!Customize every part of the scene, including the waves, sharks, aircraft, signs, umbrella, and more - thousands of possible combinations! You can also hide or show the items in the scene to create your own beach. Or, select one of the preset themes and choose from the 'Private Beach', 'Fireworks at Night', 'Family Outing', 'Independence Day', or 'Shark Sighting' themes.This wallpaper is true 3D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life.Works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.PERMISSIONS: Coarse location permissions are required in order to determine an approximate location for accurate sunrise / sunset times.Problems?  Just email our support team with the model of your phone and a description of the problem.

reviews.title: The best.
reviews.comment: This is the most stunning live wallpaper I\'ve ever used, with amazing scenes and customization of nearly every aspect to suit you, and it all works flawlessly.
reviews.author: Ettienne Nel

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Gorgeous and peaceful. Latest update is very nice. Used ADW Launcher to get a blank desktop, now all I see is beach. Love it.
reviews.author: Sean Fenton

reviews.title: Life\'s a Beach!
reviews.comment: Customize your very own sunny, sandy retreat w/ this stunning live wp. DualBoot Dev.\'s sure know how to make Homescreens fun and beautiful. Add your own text to airplane flyers and beach sign, choose colours of various beach goodies, celebrate the 4th of July, and SO much more! Worth every penny! One small suggestion for update or add-on: seagulls flying/landing on chair & crabs!
reviews.author: Janna Campbell

reviews.title: LOVE the update!!  10 stars!!
reviews.comment: The update is wonderful! Love yall!!! Best live wallpapers out there! The new details & improvements are awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love everything Dualboot! I have almost all your stuff! The graphics are stunning! I would like to see a tropical island, winterscape, fall in the woods, and a jungle theme! You could do it the best! Please !
reviews.author: Anissa Reynolds

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love the beautiful graphics. It would be sweet to have sounds of the Waves, fire works, wind and other things
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Un-productive
reviews.comment: At times I just find myself staring at this beach and daydreaming that I\'m there. Setting in that beach chair and drinking a cold one. \"Wow.. did you see that?..it looked like a shark fin!\"  Too good. I can\'t wait for this evenings bon-fire and fireworks. It will be a scene from a Frankie Avalon move! Then to wake up with that beautiful sunrise and do it all over again! I\'m off to build a sand castle!
reviews.author: Gary Dee

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The new version is awesome!  I notice thw difference in thr fireworks,  and the bonfire!  The shooting stars are great too.  Thanks.
reviews.author: Patricia Bell

reviews.title: Pretty beach scene
reviews.comment: I love my beach scene. It\'s nice to have so many customization features because I can change things periodically and screen doesn\'t feel like the same old same old. I especially like the option to have the scene reflect the tim of day. Nice graphics! My Galaxy S3 has a seagull ringtone, so it completes the beach theme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The BEST LWP ever!!
reviews.comment: Totally worth every cent. Almost everything can be customised and the images & graphics are stunningly sharp & clear. l sometimes just stare at the LWP for a bit of relaxation in the middle of work haha. Amazing work, guys!!
reviews.author: LC Quek

reviews.title: Love This!!
reviews.comment: I absolutely think this is one of the best live wallpapers out there. It\'s beautifully made, full of content & makes me feel as though I am sitting on a beach in So-California, & all that is missing are the sound & spray of the ocean waves... well also, the crowds we Californians expect at the beach. (o`;`o)  The latest upgrades to the app make it an even more beautiful wallpaper, especially the increase of more fireworks at night. And I would definitely recommend this to all beach lovers!! \\ (\342\200\242\302\260 u \302\260\342\200\242) /
reviews.author: Pug Pugsley

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: It\'s perfect as it is but perhaps changing weather would be fun too.
reviews.author: Regina Phalange

reviews.title: Thanks for the holiday!
reviews.comment: As I have not been and will not go on holidays for....!!!!you bring the sea to my tablet, so paying a small fee is really worth it! Thanks:-)
reviews.author: Clotilde Inaebnit

reviews.title: Love it however
reviews.comment: I love it however it would be even cooler if there was people swimming and playing on the beach party theme + random weather for all themes thunderstorms,havy rain, light rain, medium rain other than that I love it
reviews.author: Jeremiah G

reviews.title: Fantastic Beach LWP!!!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this lwp. It is by far one of the best lwp\'s on the site and works equally great on phones and tablets. The options for customization are so fun. Sit back and let the waves take you to a very relaxing place.
reviews.author: Kim Osborn

reviews.title: Super wallpaper!
reviews.comment: With the new update this wallpaper is the best for summer time!! I hope you will find the way to put real local weather on your wallpapers! They could become a must have for every smartphone! Sorry for my bad English! ;-)
reviews.author: Michela Anselmi

reviews.title: Fantastic wallpaper.
reviews.comment: I thought the trial version seemed promising as it looked pretty and was fairly fluid and so I thought: \"Sod it, I\'ll give it a go\". And I wasn\'t disappointed. There are quite a few personalisation and customisation options and it runs very well. Some kind of interaction with the screen maybe? And please add a palm tree or coconuts, things like that to give the option to make your beach exotic in appearance instead of the default. Perhaps a beach hut too or floating lanterns, please? Stuff like that. I want to go from British seaside to Southeast Asian paradise! Hope dev\' is responsive. Otherwise it\'s brilliant.
reviews.author: Jay Cee

reviews.title: Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: The BEST summer lwp on the market! Worth every penny! The graphics are wonderful and I love all the aspects you can customize. I just wish the weather changed with local weather...it would be cool to see an occasional thunderstorm on the ocean.
reviews.author: Erin Oldaker

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: One of the best live wallpapers out there and the only one I\'ve spent money on!  Love, love, love it!!
reviews.author: Maryann Layton

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very nice wallpaper. Occasional rains with rainbows will be appreciated. Also the change of time and light conditions is sudden, a gradual change will be more realistic and lovely to watch just like BLUE SKIES LWP which is the other one I own.
reviews.author: Chirag D H
